connectFour

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • connectFour.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that contains the logic and the rules for the Connect Four Game. It also keeps track of the fields that are filled.
    Author:
    Gerwin Puttenstein

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Creates a new empty Board

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int checkForFreeSpot(int col, PlayerColor color)
      Checks if the spot in a column is free so it drops completely down.
      void countDiagonalLeft(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Counts all the diagonal fields from right up to left down from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
      void countDiagonalRight(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Counts all the diagonal fields from left up to right down from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
      void countHorizontal(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Counts all the horizontal fields up and down from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
      void countVertical(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Counts all the vertical fields left and right from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
      boolean gameOver(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Checks if the game is over, so if there is a winner or if the Board is full

      Checks if the given index is a field on the Board

      Checks if the given PlayerColor is a winner

      Resets the Board by setting all the fields to empty

      • checkForFreeSpot

        public int checkForFreeSpot(int col,
                   PlayerColor color)
        Checks if the spot in a column is free so it drops completely down. If the column is full, the program terminates, because it is not a valid move. If the field is found and the column is not full, the field is returned.
        Parameters:
        col -
        color -
        Returns:
